laby / creature / 18 years old

i'm laby and i have darkness in my heart... i am a strange being of the orb quality and i am passionate about way too many things in this world. my sona is the character in the image to the right, click to see the full thing. i'm a secluded autist who strays away from mainstream society and perspectives. i like staying in my own personal world, and try to be very open minded when it comes to other people... however, i am not open-minded towards hatred, especially over petty things like fictional content and aspects people cannot control. i disagree with dni lists in their entirety. my biggest interests include touhou, pathologic, animanga, visual novels, susumu hirasawa, jun togawa, rpgmaker games, and cosplay. my discord username is eyeorb.
